prompts.english_archetype: Pick up the red block and place it on the blue block.
prompts.target_translation: रक्तखण्डं उत्थापय, ततः नीलखण्डस्य उपरि स्थापय।

prompts.english_archetype: Move the arm to coordinate (10, 20, 30).
Rotate the wrist 90 degrees clockwise.
Grasp the object with 5N force.
Navigate to the kitchen and avoid obstacles.
prompts.target_translation: रसवतीं गच्छ, मार्गे अवरोधकान् परिहर च।

prompts.english_archetype: Pour water from the pitcher into the glass.
Fold the laundry neatly.
Open the door and hold it for the person.
prompts.target_translation: द्वारं उद्घाटय, आगच्छते जनाय तत् धृत्वा तिष्ठ।

prompts.english_archetype: Assemble the IKEA chair following instructions.
Weld the two metal plates together.
Solder the component onto the PCB.
Harvest the ripe tomatoes from the vine.
Sort the packages by size and color.
prompts.target_translation: आकारेण वर्णेन च संपुटानां (packages) वर्गीकरणं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Stack the boxes in a pyramid shape.
Unscrew the bolt from the engine block.
Paint the wall with vertical strokes.
Vacuum the living room carpet.
Mow the lawn in a striped pattern.
Serve the food to the guests at the table.
Clear the dishes and put them in the dishwasher.
prompts.target_translation: पात्राणि उत्थापय, तानि क्षालनयन्त्रे स्थापय च।

prompts.english_archetype: Retrieve the medical kit from the shelf.
Assist the patient in walking to the bed.
prompts.target_translation: रोगिणं शय्यां प्रति चलितुं साहाय्यं कुरु।

prompts.english_archetype: Perform CPR on the dummy.
Disarm the mock explosive device.
Inspect the pipeline for cracks.
prompts.target_translation: नळिकायां (pipeline) छिद्राणि सन्ति वा इति निरीक्षस्व।
